name: Bear Onesie
description:
## Bear Onesie

A cozy and cute outfit that will make you feel like a cuddly and playful bear. Perfect for parties!

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
